title: Teleport
content:
Teleport is a spell that will teleport the player to their desired location. To gain access to a location, a player must first activate the Portal Stone of that area.


 * Hopeport Portal Stone
 * Hopeforest Central Portal Stone
 * Hopeforest North Portal Stone
 * Mine Southwest Portal Stone
 * Mine Deep Portal Stone
 * Crenopolis Outskirts Portal Stone
 * Crenopolis Market Portal Stone
